granularity.title: Sample granularity
granularity.description: The granularity of the data samples. Currently only 'csv' is supported.

has_header.title: Has_Header
has_header.description: Whether the proposed files should contain headers

default_predictor_col.title: Default predictor column
default_predictor_col.description: Zero-based index of the data column that should be the predictor by default. This will be used for the automatic shapley calculation.

default_task.title: Default machine learning task
default_task.description: The default learning task that should be executed using the default_predictor_col
